channel.title: Xp Rate
channel.description: Hello everyone, i need to know how to change the xp rate on my 317 servers, and if anyone knows how to on a 508 that would be awesome 2. Thank you all. :cool:

item.title: Xp Rate
item.dc:creator: @aurocaido aurocaido
item.description:
@aurocaido wrote:

thank you all very much! i really appreciate the help, and if anyone else knows something else about xp rate please tell me. Thank You all.

Read full topic

item.title: Xp Rate
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

yea it only trains attack, strength, def and hp
for other skills they usually have their own cases and strings.
try searching for the name of each skill you wanna change that isn’t changed by the combatexprate and generally you can see numbers and rates of which the xp is gained and for prayer try searching. “you bury the bones” and around the area there will be an xp rate for burying certain types of bones

Read full topic

item.title: Xp Rate
item.dc:creator: @klomp3 klomp3
item.description:
@klomp3 wrote:

there isn’t a xprate for all, just change that and you will train the cb skills faster

Read full topic

item.title: Xp Rate
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

[quote=“TimmahPwnz, post:2, topic:305482”][317] Search In Client.java

if (FightType == 1) // Accurate
Change 300 (Or Whatever The Number Is) In The Same Spot, Ill ## Them
You’ll Find Something Like This

                        if (FightType == 1) // Accurate                 
                        TotalExp = (double) (#300# * hitDiff); << Change 300 (Or Whatever The Number Is)
                        TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                        addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack);
                    } else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive
                    {
                        TotalExp = (double) (#300# * hitDiff); // Defence
                        TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                        addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
                    } else if (FightType == 4) // Defensive
                    {
                        TotalExp = (double) (#100# * hitDiff);
                        TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                        addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence);
                    } else if (FightType == 3) // Controlled
                    {
                        TotalExp = (double) (#300# * hitDiff); // Strength
                        TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                        addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
                    }
                    TotalExp = (double) (#100# * hitDiff); //HealthPoints
                    TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                    addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerHitpoints);[/quote]

lol… thats for different attack styles… if u wanna find the proper rates search for in client.java:
combatexprate and it will have combatexprate:## change that number to suit the rates on your server :3

Read full topic

item.title: Xp Rate
item.dc:creator: @TimmahPwnz TimmahPwnz
item.description:
@TimmahPwnz wrote:

[317] Search In Client.java

if (FightType == 1) // Accurate
Change 300 (Or Whatever The Number Is) In The Same Spot, Ill ## Them
You’ll Find Something Like This

                        if (FightType == 1) // Accurate                 
                        TotalExp = (double) (#300# * hitDiff); << Change 300 (Or Whatever The Number Is)
                        TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                        addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack);
                    } else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive
                    {
                        TotalExp = (double) (#300# * hitDiff); // Defence
                        TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                        addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
                    } else if (FightType == 4) // Defensive
                    {
                        TotalExp = (double) (#100# * hitDiff);
                        TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                        addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence);
                    } else if (FightType == 3) // Controlled
                    {
                        TotalExp = (double) (#300# * hitDiff); // Strength
                        TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                        addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
                    }
                    TotalExp = (double) (#100# * hitDiff); //HealthPoints
                    TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                    addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
